title: Please add support for CLOCK_MONOTONIC_RAW clock source.
body: Currently, Linux subsystem supports CLOCK_REALTIME and CLOCK_MONOTONIC as parameters for clock_gettime(). It would be helpful if CLOCK_MONOTONIC_RAW support was also added (this clock source is the default e.g. in Unreal Engine 4 on Linux, possibly other performance-oriented programs).

comments.body: This is also used by many rails apps that use the "Thin" webserver, which effectively kills many rails apps from running on WSL
